CodeSnippets.Name: Understanding OpenAI API Call -  A Comprehensive Guide
CodeSnippets.Description: Explore a detailed guide on how to integrate and utilize OpenAI's GPT-4 model in C#. Dive deep into the code explanation, setup, and response handling to harness the power of AI in your applications.
